thread.section_title: Suntransfers.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Suntransfers.com | suntransfers.com
thread.title: Sue Bullock

author: Sue Bullock
title: Sue Bullock
text: I contacted Suntransfers to book a transfer from Amsterdam airport into the city for myself and my husband who both use a mobility scooter (the ones that come apart to go in the car boot) only to be told it was company policy that they wouldn't take electric scooters. I have never heard anything so ridiculous in my life. What harm can a mobility scooter do?? The airlines have no problem taking them. My husband would even be willing to take them apart and put them in the car himself. I am disgusted. We have now had to cancel our plans to visit Amsterdam.
